006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function; // NOPMD - intentional
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBase64BinaryItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateWithTimeZoneItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDayTimeDurationItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDurationItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IYearMonthDurationItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
023
024import java.math.BigDecimal;
025import java.math.BigInteger;
026import java.time.Duration;
027import java.time.Period;
028import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
029import java.time.temporal.TemporalAmount;
030import java.util.Set;
031
032import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
034
035public final class OperationFunctions { // NOPMD - intentional
036  @NonNull
037  public static final Set<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>> AGGREGATE_MATH_TYPES = ObjectUtils.notNull(Set.of(
038      IDayTimeDurationItem.class,
039      IYearMonthDurationItem.class,
040      INumericItem.class));
041
042  private OperationFunctions() {
043    // disable
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
048   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-yearMonthDuration-to-date">op:add-yearMonthDuration-to-date</a>.
049   *
050   * @param instant
051   *          a point in time
052   * @param duration
053   *          the duration to add
054   * @return the result of adding the duration to the date
055   */
056  @NonNull
057  public static IDateItem opAddYearMonthDurationToDate(@NonNull IDateItem instant,
058      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem duration) {
059    return addDurationToDate(instant.asZonedDateTime(), duration.asPeriod());
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
064   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-dayTimeDuration-to-date">op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-date</a>.
065   *
066   * @param instant
067   *          a point in time
068   * @param duration
069   *          the duration to add
070   * @return the result of adding the duration to the date
071   */
072  @NonNull
073  public static IDateItem opAddDayTimeDurationToDate(@NonNull IDateItem instant,
074      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem duration) {
075    return addDurationToDate(instant.asZonedDateTime(), duration.asDuration());
076  }
077
078  @NonNull
079  private static IDateItem addDurationToDate(@NonNull ZonedDateTime dateTime, @NonNull TemporalAmount duration) {
080    ZonedDateTime result;
081    try {
082      result = dateTime.plus(duration);
083    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
084      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
085    }
086    assert result != null;
087    return IDateWithTimeZoneItem.valueOf(result);
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
092   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-yearMonthDurations">op:add-yearMonthDurations</a>.
093   *
094   * @param arg1
095   *          the first duration
096   * @param arg2
097   *          the second duration
098   * @return the sum of two duration values
099   */
100  @NonNull
101  public static IYearMonthDurationItem opAddYearMonthDurations(
102      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
103      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg2) {
104    Period duration1 = arg1.asPeriod();
105    Period duration2 = arg2.asPeriod();
106
107    Period result;
108    try {
109      result = duration1.plus(duration2);
110    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
111      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
112    }
113    assert result != null;
114    return IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(result);
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
119   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-dayTimeDurations">op:add-dayTimeDurations</a>.
120   *
121   * @param arg1
122   *          the first duration
123   * @param arg2
124   *          the second duration
125   * @return the sum of two duration values
126   */
127  @NonNull
128  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opAddDayTimeDurations(
129      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
130      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
131    Duration duration1 = arg1.asDuration();
132    Duration duration2 = arg2.asDuration();
133
134    Duration result;
135    try {
136      result = duration1.plus(duration2);
137    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
138      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
139    }
140    assert result != null;
141    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(result);
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
146   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-yearMonthDuration-to-dateTime">op:add-yearMonthDuration-to-dateTime</a>.
147   *
148   * @param instant
149   *          a point in time
150   * @param duration
151   *          the duration to add
152   * @return the result of adding the duration to the date
153   */
154  @NonNull
155  public static IDateTimeItem opAddYearMonthDurationToDateTime(
156      @NonNull IDateTimeItem instant,
157      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem duration) {
158    ZonedDateTime result;
159    try {
160      result = instant.asZonedDateTime().plus(duration.asPeriod());
161    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
162      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
163    }
164    assert result != null;
165    return IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem.valueOf(result);
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
170   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime">op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime</a>.
171   *
172   * @param instant
173   *          a point in time
174   * @param duration
175   *          the duration to add
176   * @return the result of adding the duration to the date
177   */
178  @NonNull
179  public static IDateTimeItem opAddDayTimeDurationToDateTime(
180      @NonNull IDateTimeItem instant,
181      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem duration) {
182    ZonedDateTime result;
183    try {
184      result = instant.asZonedDateTime().plus(duration.asDuration());
185    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
186      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
187    }
188    assert result != null;
189    return IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem.valueOf(result);
190  }
191
192  /**
193   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
194   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dates">op:subtract-dates</a>.
195   *
196   * @param date1
197   *          the first point in time
198   * @param date2
199   *          the second point in time
200   * @return the elapsed time between the starting instant and ending instant
201   */
202  @NonNull
203  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opSubtractDates(@NonNull IDateItem date1, @NonNull IDateItem date2) {
204    return between(date1.asZonedDateTime(), date2.asZonedDateTime());
205  }
206
207  /**
208   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
209   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-yearMonthDuration-from-date">op:subtract-yearMonthDuration-from-date</a>.
210   *
211   * @param date
212   *          a point in time
213   * @param duration
214   *          the duration to subtract
215   * @return the result of subtracting the duration from the date
216   */
217  @NonNull
218  public static IDateItem opSubtractYearMonthDurationFromDate(
219      @NonNull IDateItem date,
220      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem duration) {
221    return subtractDurationFromDate(date.asZonedDateTime(), duration.asPeriod());
222  }
223
224  /**
225   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
226   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dayTimeDuration-from-date">op:subtract-dayTimeDuration-from-date</a>.
227   *
228   * @param date
229   *          a point in time
230   * @param duration
231   *          the duration to subtract
232   * @return the result of subtracting the duration from the date
233   */
234  @NonNull
235  public static IDateItem opSubtractDayTimeDurationFromDate(
236      @NonNull IDateItem date,
237      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem duration) {
238    return subtractDurationFromDate(date.asZonedDateTime(), duration.asDuration());
239  }
240
241  @NonNull
242  private static IDateItem subtractDurationFromDate(
243      @NonNull ZonedDateTime dateTime,
244      @NonNull TemporalAmount duration) {
245    return IDateWithTimeZoneItem.valueOf(
246        ObjectUtils.notNull(dateTime.minus(duration)));
247  }
248
249  /**
250   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
251   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-yearMonthDurations">op:subtract-yearMonthDurations</a>.
252   *
253   * @param arg1
254   *          the first duration
255   * @param arg2
256   *          the second duration
257   * @return the result of subtracting the second duration from the first
258   */
259  @NonNull
260  public static IYearMonthDurationItem opSubtractYearMonthDurations(
261      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
262      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg2) {
263    Period duration1 = arg1.asPeriod();
264    Period duration2 = arg2.asPeriod();
265
266    return IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(
267        ObjectUtils.notNull(duration1.minus(duration2)));
268  }
269
270  /**
271   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
272   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dayTimeDurations">op:subtract-dayTimeDurations</a>.
273   *
274   * @param arg1
275   *          the first duration
276   * @param arg2
277   *          the second duration
278   * @return the result of subtracting the second duration from the first
279   */
280  @NonNull
281  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opSubtractDayTimeDurations(
282      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
283      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
284    Duration duration1 = arg1.asDuration();
285    Duration duration2 = arg2.asDuration();
286
287    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(
288        ObjectUtils.notNull(duration1.minus(duration2)));
289  }
290
291  /**
292   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
293   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dateTimes">op:subtract-dateTimes</a>.
294   *
295   * @param time1
296   *          the first point in time
297   * @param time2
298   *          the second point in time
299   * @return the duration the occurred between the two points in time
300   */
301  @NonNull
302  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opSubtractDateTimes(@NonNull IDateTimeItem time1, @NonNull IDateTimeItem time2) {
303    return between(time1.asZonedDateTime(), time2.asZonedDateTime());
304  }
305
306  /**
307   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
308   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dateTimes">op:subtract-dateTimes</a>.
309   *
310   * @param time1
311   *          the first point in time
312   * @param time2
313   *          the second point in time
314   * @return the duration the occurred between the two points in time
315   */
316  @NonNull
317  private static IDayTimeDurationItem between(@NonNull ZonedDateTime time1, @NonNull ZonedDateTime time2) {
318    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(
319        ObjectUtils.notNull(Duration.between(time1, time2)));
320  }
321
322  /**
323   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
324   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-yearMonthDuration-from-dateTime">op:subtract-yearMonthDuration-from-dateTime</a>.
325   *
326   * @param moment
327   *          a point in time
328   * @param duration
329   *          the duration to subtract
330   * @return the result of subtracting the duration from a point in time
331   */
332  @NonNull
333  public static IDateTimeItem opSubtractYearMonthDurationFromDateTime(
334      @NonNull IDateTimeItem moment,
335      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem duration) {
336    return IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem.valueOf(
337        ObjectUtils.notNull(moment.asZonedDateTime().minus(duration.asPeriod())));
338  }
339
340  /**
341   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
342   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dayTimeDuration-from-dateTime">op:subtract-dayTimeDuration-from-dateTime</a>.
343   *
344   * @param moment
345   *          a point in time
346   * @param duration
347   *          the duration to subtract
348   * @return the result of subtracting the duration from a point in time
349   */
350  @NonNull
351  public static IDateTimeItem opSubtractDayTimeDurationFromDateTime(
352      @NonNull IDateTimeItem moment,
353      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem duration) {
354    return IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem.valueOf(
355        ObjectUtils.notNull(moment.asZonedDateTime().plus(duration.asDuration())));
356  }
357
358  /**
359   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
360   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-multiply-yearMonthDuration">op:multiply-yearMonthDuration</a>.
361   *
362   * @param arg1
363   *          the duration value
364   * @param arg2
365   *          the number to multiply by
366   * @return the result of multiplying a {@link IYearMonthDurationItem} by a
367   *         number
368   */
369  @NonNull
370  public static IYearMonthDurationItem opMultiplyYearMonthDuration(
371      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
372      @NonNull INumericItem arg2) {
373    int arg2Int;
374    try {
375      arg2Int = FunctionUtils.asInteger(arg2.round());
376    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
377      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
378    }
379
380    return IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(
381        ObjectUtils.notNull(arg1.asPeriod().multipliedBy(arg2Int)));
382  }
383
384  /**
385   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
386   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-multiply-dayTimeDuration">op:multiply-dayTimeDuration</a>.
387   *
388   * @param arg1
389   *          the duration value
390   * @param arg2
391   *          the number to multiply by
392   * @return the result of multiplying a {@link IDayTimeDurationItem} by a number
393   */
394  @NonNull
395  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opMultiplyDayTimeDuration(
396      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
397      @NonNull INumericItem arg2) {
398    long arg2Long;
399    try {
400      arg2Long = FunctionUtils.asLong(arg2.round());
401    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
402      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
403    }
404    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(
405        ObjectUtils.notNull(arg1.asDuration().multipliedBy(arg2Long)));
406  }
407
408  /**
409   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
410   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-divide-yearMonthDuration">op:divide-yearMonthDuration</a>.
411   *
412   * @param arg1
413   *          the duration value
414   * @param arg2
415   *          the number to divide by
416   * @return the result of dividing a {@link IYearMonthDurationItem} by a number
417   */
418  @NonNull
419  public static IYearMonthDurationItem opDivideYearMonthDuration(
420      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
421      @NonNull INumericItem arg2) {
422    IIntegerItem totalMonths = IIntegerItem.valueOf(arg1.asPeriod().toTotalMonths());
423    IIntegerItem result = opNumericIntegerDivide(totalMonths, arg2);
424    int months;
425    try {
426      months = FunctionUtils.asInteger(result.asInteger());
427    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
428      throw new DateTimeFunctionException(DateTimeFunctionException.DURATION_OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR,
429          "Overflow/underflow in duration operation.", ex);
430    }
431    int years = months / 12;
432    months = months % 12;
433    return IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(years, months);
434  }
435
436  /**
437   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
438   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-divide-dayTimeDuration">op:divide-dayTimeDuration</a>.
439   *
440   * @param arg1
441   *          the duration value
442   * @param arg2
443   *          the number to divide by
444   * @return the result of dividing a {@link IDayTimeDurationItem} by a number
445   */
446  @NonNull
447  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opDivideDayTimeDuration(
448      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
449      @NonNull INumericItem arg2) {
450    try {
451      return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(
452          ObjectUtils.notNull(arg1.asDuration().dividedBy(FunctionUtils.asLong(arg2.round()))));
453    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
454      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO, "Division by zero", ex);
455    }
456  }
457
458  /**
459   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
460   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-divide-dayTimeDuration-by-dayTimeDuration">op:divide-dayTimeDuration-by-dayTimeDuration</a>.
461   *
462   * @param arg1
463   *          the first duration value
464   * @param arg2
465   *          the second duration value
466   * @return the ratio of two {@link IDayTimeDurationItem} values, as a decimal
467   *         number
468   */
469  @NonNull
470  public static IDecimalItem opDivideDayTimeDurationByDayTimeDuration(
471      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
472      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
473    return IDecimalItem.cast(
474        opNumericDivide(
475            IDecimalItem.valueOf(arg1.asSeconds()),
476            IDecimalItem.valueOf(arg2.asSeconds())));
477  }
478
479  /**
480   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
481   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-date-equal">op:date-equal</a>.
482   *
483   * @param arg1
484   *          the first value
485   * @param arg2
486   *          the second value
487   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is the same instant in time as the
488   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
489   */
490  @NonNull
491  public static IBooleanItem opDateEqual(@NonNull IDateItem arg1, @NonNull IDateItem arg2) {
492    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().equals(arg2.asZonedDateTime()));
493  }
494
495  /**
496   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
497   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dateTime-equal">op:dateTime-equal</a>.
498   *
499   * @param arg1
500   *          the first value
501   * @param arg2
502   *          the second value
503   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is the same instant in time as the
504   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
505   */
506  @NonNull
507  public static IBooleanItem opDateTimeEqual(@NonNull IDateTimeItem arg1, @NonNull IDateTimeItem arg2) {
508    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().equals(arg2.asZonedDateTime()));
509  }
510
511  /**
512   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
513   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-duration-equal">op:duration-equal</a>.
514   *
515   * @param arg1
516   *          the first value
517   * @param arg2
518   *          the second value
519   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is the same duration as the
520   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
521   */
522  @NonNull
523  public static IBooleanItem opDurationEqual(@NonNull IDurationItem arg1, @NonNull IDurationItem arg2) {
524    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) == 0);
525  }
526
527  /**
528   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
529   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-base64Binary-equal">op:base64Binary-equal</a>.
530   *
531   * @param arg1
532   *          the first value
533   * @param arg2
534   *          the second value
535   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is equal to the second, or
536   *         {@code false} otherwise
537   */
538  @NonNull
539  public static IBooleanItem opBase64BinaryEqual(@NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg1, @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg2) {
540    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asByteBuffer().equals(arg2.asByteBuffer()));
541  }
542
543  /**
544   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
545   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-date-greater-than">op:date-greater-than</a>.
546   *
547   * @param arg1
548   *          the first value
549   * @param arg2
550   *          the second value
551   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a later instant in time than
552   *         the second, or {@code false} otherwise
553   */
554  @NonNull
555  public static IBooleanItem opDateGreaterThan(@NonNull IDateItem arg1, @NonNull IDateItem arg2) {
556    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().compareTo(arg2.asZonedDateTime()) > 0);
557  }
558
559  /**
560   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
561   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dateTime-greater-than">op:dateTime-greater-than</a>.
562   *
563   * @param arg1
564   *          the first value
565   * @param arg2
566   *          the second value
567   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a later instant in time than
568   *         the second, or {@code false} otherwise
569   */
570  @NonNull
571  public static IBooleanItem opDateTimeGreaterThan(@NonNull IDateTimeItem arg1, @NonNull IDateTimeItem arg2) {
572    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().compareTo(arg2.asZonedDateTime()) > 0);
573  }
574
575  /**
576   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
577   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-yearMonthDuration-greater-than">op:yearMonthDuration-greater-than</a>.
578   *
579   * @param arg1
580   *          the first value
581   * @param arg2
582   *          the second value
583   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a longer duration than the
584   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
585   */
586  @NonNull
587  public static IBooleanItem opYearMonthDurationGreaterThan(
588      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
589      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg2) {
590    Period p1 = arg1.asPeriod();
591    Period p2 = arg2.asPeriod();
592
593    // this is only an approximation
594    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(p1.toTotalMonths() > p2.toTotalMonths());
595  }
596
597  /**
598   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
599   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dayTimeDuration-greater-than">op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than</a>.
600   *
601   * @param arg1
602   *          the first value
603   * @param arg2
604   *          the second value
605   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a longer duration than the
606   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
607   */
608  @NonNull
609  public static IBooleanItem opDayTimeDurationGreaterThan(
610      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
611      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
612    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) > 0);
613  }
614
615  /**
616   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
617   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-base64Binary-greater-than">op:base64Binary-greater-than</a>.
618   *
619   * @param arg1
620   *          the first value
621   * @param arg2
622   *          the second value
623   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is greater than the second, or
624   *         {@code false} otherwise
625   */
626  @NonNull
627  public static IBooleanItem opBase64BinaryGreaterThan(
628      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg1,
629      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg2) {
630    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) > 0);
631  }

633  /**
634   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
635   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-date-less-than">op:date-less-than</a>.
636   *
637   * @param arg1
638   *          the first value
639   * @param arg2
640   *          the second value
641   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is an earlier instant in time than
642   *         the second, or {@code false} otherwise
643   */
644  @NonNull
645  public static IBooleanItem opDateLessThan(
646      @NonNull IDateItem arg1,
647      @NonNull IDateItem arg2) {
648    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().compareTo(arg2.asZonedDateTime()) < 0);
649  }

651  /**
652   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
653   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dateTime-less-than">op:dateTime-less-than</a>.
654   *
655   * @param arg1
656   *          the first value
657   * @param arg2
658   *          the second value
659   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is an earlier instant in time than
660   *         the second, or {@code false} otherwise
661   */
662  @NonNull
663  public static IBooleanItem opDateTimeLessThan(
664      @NonNull IDateTimeItem arg1,
665      @NonNull IDateTimeItem arg2) {
666    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().compareTo(arg2.asZonedDateTime()) < 0);
667  }

669  /**
670   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
671   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-yearMonthDuration-less-than">op:yearMonthDuration-less-than</a>.
672   *
673   * @param arg1
674   *          the first value
675   * @param arg2
676   *          the second value
677   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a shorter duration than the
678   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
679   */
680  @NonNull
681  public static IBooleanItem opYearMonthDurationLessThan(@NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
682      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg2) {
683    Period p1 = arg1.asPeriod();
684    Period p2 = arg2.asPeriod();
685
686    // this is only an approximation
687    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(p1.toTotalMonths() < p2.toTotalMonths());
688  }

691   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
692   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dayTimeDuration-less-than">op:dayTimeDuration-less-than</a>.

696   * @param arg2

699   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
700   */
701  @NonNull
702  public static IBooleanItem opDayTimeDurationLessThan(
703      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
704      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
705    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) < 0);
706  }

708  /**
709   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
710   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-base64Binary-less-than">op:base64Binary-less-than</a>.
711   *
712   * @param arg1
713   *          the first value
714   * @param arg2
715   *          the second value
716   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is less than the second, or
717   *         {@code false} otherwise

719  @NonNull
720  public static IBooleanItem opBase64BinaryLessThan(
721      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg1,
722      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg2) {
723    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) < 0);

725
726  /**
727   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
728   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-add">op:numeric-add</a>.
729   *
730   * @param left
731   *          the first number
732   * @param right
733   *          the second number
734   * @return the result of adding the second number to the first number
735   */
736  @NonNull
737  public static INumericItem opNumericAdd(@NonNull INumericItem left, @NonNull INumericItem right) {
738    INumericItem retval;
739    if (left instanceof IIntegerItem || right instanceof IIntegerItem) {
740      // create an integer result
741      BigInteger integerLeft = left.asInteger();
742      BigInteger integerRight = right.asInteger();
743      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(
744          ObjectUtils.notNull(integerLeft.add(integerRight)));
745    } else {
746      // create a decimal result
747      BigDecimal decimalLeft = left.asDecimal();
748      BigDecimal decimalRight = right.asDecimal();
749      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(
750          ObjectUtils.notNull(decimalLeft.add(decimalRight, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT)));
751    }
752    return retval;
753  }
754
755  /**
756   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
757   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-subtract">op:numeric-subtract</a>.
758   *
759   * @param left
760   *          the first number
761   * @param right
762   *          the second number
763   * @return the result of subtracting the second number from the first number
764   */
765  @NonNull
766  public static INumericItem opNumericSubtract(@NonNull INumericItem left, @NonNull INumericItem right) {
767    INumericItem retval;
768    if (left instanceof IIntegerItem || right instanceof IIntegerItem) {
769      // create an integer result
770      BigInteger integerLeft = left.asInteger();
771      BigInteger integerRight = right.asInteger();
772      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(
773          ObjectUtils.notNull(integerLeft.subtract(integerRight)));
774    } else {
775      // create a decimal result
776      BigDecimal decimalLeft = left.asDecimal();
777      BigDecimal decimalRight = right.asDecimal();
778      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(
779          ObjectUtils.notNull(decimalLeft.subtract(decimalRight, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT)));
780    }
781    return retval;
782  }
783
784  /**
785   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
786   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-multiply">op:numeric-multiply</a>.
787   *
788   * @param left
789   *          the first number
790   * @param right
791   *          the second number
792   * @return the result of multiplying the first number by the second number
793   */
794  @NonNull
795  public static INumericItem opNumericMultiply(@NonNull INumericItem left, @NonNull INumericItem right) {
796    INumericItem retval;
797    if (left instanceof IIntegerItem || right instanceof IIntegerItem) {
798      // create an integer result
799      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(
800          ObjectUtils.notNull(left.asInteger().multiply(right.asInteger())));
801    } else {
802      // create a decimal result
803      BigDecimal decimalLeft = left.asDecimal();
804      BigDecimal decimalRight = right.asDecimal();
805      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(
806          ObjectUtils.notNull(decimalLeft.multiply(decimalRight, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT)));
807    }
808    return retval;
809  }
810
811  /**
812   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
813   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-divide">op:numeric-divide</a>.
814   *
815   * @param dividend
816   *          the number to be divided
817   * @param divisor
818   *          the number to divide by
819   * @return the quotient
820   */
821  @NonNull
822  public static IDecimalItem opNumericDivide(@NonNull INumericItem dividend, @NonNull INumericItem divisor) {
823    // create a decimal result
824    BigDecimal decimalDivisor = divisor.asDecimal();
825
826    if (BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(decimalDivisor)) {
827      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO,
828          ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO_MESSAGE);
829    }
830
831    BigDecimal decimalDividend = dividend.asDecimal();
832    return IDecimalItem.valueOf(
833        ObjectUtils.notNull(decimalDividend.divide(decimalDivisor, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT)));
834  }
835
836  /**
837   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
838   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-integer-divide">op:numeric-integer-divide</a>.
839   *
840   * @param dividend
841   *          the number to be divided
842   * @param divisor
843   *          the number to divide by
844   * @return the quotient
845   */
846  @NonNull
847  public static IIntegerItem opNumericIntegerDivide(@NonNull INumericItem dividend, @NonNull INumericItem divisor) {
848    IIntegerItem retval;
849    if (dividend instanceof IIntegerItem || divisor instanceof IIntegerItem) {
850      // create an integer result
851      BigInteger integerDivisor = divisor.asInteger();
852
853      if (BigInteger.ZERO.equals(integerDivisor)) {
854        throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO,
855            ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO_MESSAGE);
856      }
857      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(
858          ObjectUtils.notNull(dividend.asInteger().divide(integerDivisor)));
859    } else {
860      // create a decimal result
861      BigDecimal decimalDivisor = divisor.asDecimal();
862
863      if (BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(decimalDivisor)) {
864        throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO,
865            ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO_MESSAGE);
866      }
867
868      BigDecimal decimalDividend = dividend.asDecimal();
869      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(
870          ObjectUtils.notNull(decimalDividend
871              .divideToIntegralValue(decimalDivisor, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT).toBigInteger()));
872    }
873    return retval;
874  }
875
876  /**
877   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
878   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-mod">op:numeric-mod</a>.
879   *
880   * @param dividend
881   *          the number to be divided
882   * @param divisor
883   *          the number to divide by
884   * @return the remainder
885   */
886  @NonNull
887  public static INumericItem opNumericMod(@NonNull INumericItem dividend, @NonNull INumericItem divisor) {
888    BigDecimal decimalDivisor = divisor.asDecimal();
889
890    if (BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(decimalDivisor)) {
891      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO,
892          ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO_MESSAGE);
893    }
894
895    BigDecimal decimalDividend = dividend.asDecimal();
896
897    INumericItem retval;
898    if (BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(decimalDividend)) {
899      retval = dividend;
900    } else {
901      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(
902          ObjectUtils.notNull(decimalDividend.remainder(decimalDivisor, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT)));
903    }
904    return retval;
905  }
906
907  /**
908   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
909   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-unary-minus">op:numeric-unary-minus</a>.
910   *
911   * @param item
912   *          the number whose sign is to be reversed
913   * @return the number with a reversed sign
914   */
915  @NonNull
916  public static INumericItem opNumericUnaryMinus(@NonNull INumericItem item) {
917    INumericItem retval;
918    if (item instanceof IIntegerItem) {
919      // create a decimal result
920      BigInteger integer = item.asInteger();
921      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(
922          ObjectUtils.notNull(integer.negate()));
923    } else if (item instanceof IDecimalItem) {
924      // create a decimal result
925      BigDecimal decimal = item.asDecimal();
926      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(
927          ObjectUtils.notNull(decimal.negate(FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT)));
928    } else {
929      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(item);
930    }
931    return retval;
932  }
933
934  /**
935   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
936   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-equal">op:numeric-equal</a>.
937   *
938   * @param arg1
939   *          the first number to check for equality
940   * @param arg2
941   *          the second number to check for equality
942   * @return {@code true} if the numbers are numerically equal or {@code false}
943   *         otherwise
944   */
945  @NonNull
946  public static IBooleanItem opNumericEqual(@Nullable INumericItem arg1, @Nullable INumericItem arg2) {
947    IBooleanItem retval;
948    if (arg1 == null || arg2 == null) {
949      retval = IBooleanItem.FALSE;
950    } else if (arg1 instanceof IIntegerItem || arg2 instanceof IIntegerItem) {
951      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asInteger().equals(arg2.asInteger()));
952    } else {
953      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asDecimal().equals(arg2.asDecimal()));
954    }
955    return retval;
956  }
957
958  /**
959   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
960   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-greater-than">op:numeric-greater-than</a>.
961   *
962   * @param arg1
963   *          the first number to check
964   * @param arg2
965   *          the second number to check
966   * @return {@code true} if the first number is greater than or equal to the
967   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
968   */
969  @NonNull
970  public static IBooleanItem opNumericGreaterThan(@Nullable INumericItem arg1, @Nullable INumericItem arg2) {
971    IBooleanItem retval;
972    if (arg1 == null || arg2 == null) {
973      retval = IBooleanItem.FALSE;
974    } else if (arg1 instanceof IIntegerItem || arg2 instanceof IIntegerItem) {
975      int result = arg1.asInteger().compareTo(arg2.asInteger());
976      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(result > 0);
977    } else {
978      int result = arg1.asDecimal().compareTo(arg2.asDecimal());
979      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(result > 0);
980    }
981    return retval;
982  }
983
984  /**
985   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
986   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-less-than">op:numeric-less-than</a>.
987   *
988   * @param arg1
989   *          the first number to check
990   * @param arg2
991   *          the second number to check
992   * @return {@code true} if the first number is less than or equal to the second,
993   *         or {@code false} otherwise
994   */
995  @NonNull
996  public static IBooleanItem opNumericLessThan(@Nullable INumericItem arg1, @Nullable INumericItem arg2) {
997    IBooleanItem retval;
998    if (arg1 == null || arg2 == null) {
999      retval = IBooleanItem.FALSE;
1000    } else if (arg1 instanceof IIntegerItem || arg2 instanceof IIntegerItem) {
1001      int result = arg1.asInteger().compareTo(arg2.asInteger());
1002      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(result < 0);
1003    } else {
1004      int result = arg1.asDecimal().compareTo(arg2.asDecimal());
1005      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(result < 0);
1006    }
1007    return retval;
1008  }
1009
1010  /**
1011   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
1012   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-boolean-equal">op:boolean-equal</a>.
1013   *
1014   * @param arg1
1015   *          the first boolean to check
1016   * @param arg2
1017   *          the second boolean to check
1018   * @return {@code true} if the first boolean is equal to the second, or
1019   *         {@code false} otherwise
1020   */
1021  @NonNull
1022  public static IBooleanItem opBooleanEqual(@Nullable IBooleanItem arg1, @Nullable IBooleanItem arg2) {
1023    boolean left = arg1 != null && arg1.toBoolean();
1024    boolean right = arg2 != null && arg2.toBoolean();
1025
1026    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(left == right);
1027  }
1028
1029  /**
1030   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
1031   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-boolean-greater-than">op:boolean-greater-than</a>.
1032   *
1033   * @param arg1
1034   *          the first boolean to check
1035   * @param arg2
1036   *          the second boolean to check
1037   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is {@link IBooleanItem#TRUE} and
1038   *         the second is {@link IBooleanItem#FALSE}, or {@code false} otherwise
1039   */
1040  @NonNull
1041  public static IBooleanItem opBooleanGreaterThan(@Nullable IBooleanItem arg1, @Nullable IBooleanItem arg2) {
1042    boolean left = arg1 != null && arg1.toBoolean();
1043    boolean right = arg2 != null && arg2.toBoolean();
1044
1045    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(left && !right);
1046  }
1047
1048  /**
1049   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
1050   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-boolean-less-than">op:boolean-less-than</a>.
1051   *
1052   * @param arg1
1053   *          the first boolean to check
1054   * @param arg2
1055   *          the second boolean to check
1056   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is {@link IBooleanItem#FALSE} and
1057   *         the second is {@link IBooleanItem#TRUE}, or {@code false} otherwise
1058   */
1059  @NonNull
1060  public static IBooleanItem opBooleanLessThan(@Nullable IBooleanItem arg1, @Nullable IBooleanItem arg2) {
1061    boolean left = arg1 != null && arg1.toBoolean();
1062    boolean right = arg2 != null && arg2.toBoolean();
1063
1064    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(!left && right);
1065  }
1066}
